title: Spot Ethereum ETFs Unleash Remarkable $100.73M Inflow Surge
body: BitcoinWorld Spot Ethereum ETFs Unleash Remarkable $100.73M Inflow Surge Are you ready to witness a pivotal moment in the digital asset space? The U.S. financial landscape just delivered a resounding vote of confidence in the world of cryptocurrencies, specifically in Ethereum. On June 23, Spot Ethereum ETFs recorded an impressive total net inflow of $100.73 million , signaling a robust and growing institutional appetite for the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization. This significant influx, reported by market observer Trader T on X, underscores a burgeoning interest that could reshape the future of crypto investment. What’s Driving the Latest Spot Ethereum ETFs Momentum? The recent surge in inflows into Spot Ethereum ETFs isn’t just a number; it’s a powerful indicator of increasing mainstream acceptance and institutional conviction in Ethereum’s long-term potential. After a period of anticipation, the approval and subsequent launch of these ETFs have opened up a regulated and accessible pathway for traditional investors to gain exposure to ETH without directly owning the cryptocurrency. This accessibility addresses concerns around custody, security, and regulatory compliance, making Ethereum an attractive proposition for a broader range of investors. Several factors contribute to this growing momentum: Regulatory Clarity: The SEC’s approval, even if somewhat unexpected, has provided a degree of regulatory clarity that institutional investors crave. This de-risks the asset class for many traditional funds. Diversification: For investors already holding Bitcoin ETFs, Ethereum ETFs offer a valuable diversification tool within the digital asset sector, tapping into a different blockchain ecosystem with unique use cases. Ethereum’s Ecosystem Growth: Beyond price action, Ethereum continues to be the backbone of decentralized finance (DeFi), NFTs, and a vast array of decentralized applications. Its ongoing development, including the transition to Proof-of-Stake and future scaling solutions, reinforces its utility and long-term value proposition. Market Maturation: The cryptocurrency market is evolving, moving beyond speculative retail trading to attract serious institutional capital, which views digital assets as a legitimate component of a diversified portfolio. Unpacking the Ethereum ETF Inflows: Who’s Leading the Charge? The Ethereum ETF inflows on June 23 were not evenly distributed, with some key players emerging as frontrunners in attracting capital. This provides valuable insight into which asset managers are successfully capturing investor interest in this nascent market segment. Here’s a breakdown of the leading contributors to the day’s net inflows: ETF Issuer Ticker Net Inflow (June 23) Fidelity FETH $60.48 million BlackRock ETHA $25.79 million Grayscale ETHE $9.01 million Grayscale (Mini) ETH $5.45 million Other ETFs – No Change Fidelity’s FETH clearly dominated the day’s inflows, capturing more than half of the total. This strong performance highlights Fidelity’s significant reach and trust among its client base, positioning it as a major player in the Ethereum ETF landscape right from the start. BlackRock’s ETHA also demonstrated a robust performance, underscoring its influence as the world’s largest asset manager entering the crypto space. Fidelity FETH and BlackRock ETHA: Powering the Surge The substantial contributions from Fidelity FETH and BlackRock ETHA are particularly noteworthy. These financial giants bring not only immense capital but also established distribution networks and a seal of legitimacy to the crypto market. Their active participation in attracting significant inflows suggests a concerted effort to offer diverse digital asset products to their vast clienteles. Fidelity’s Strategic Play: Fidelity has been a proactive player in the crypto space, offering various digital asset services. Their success with FETH indicates a strong alignment with investor demand for regulated crypto products. BlackRock’s Endorsement: BlackRock’s entry into the spot Bitcoin ETF market was a game-changer, and their strong showing with ETHA reinforces their long-term commitment to digital assets. Their involvement often acts as a beacon, drawing in other institutional investors who might have been hesitant previously. The combined force of these two titans driving the majority of the inflows signals a powerful shift. It moves Ethereum from a niche, speculative asset into a more widely accepted and investable instrument for traditional financial institutions and their clients. The Broader Impact on Crypto Investment and Market Sentiment These significant crypto investment inflows into spot Ethereum ETFs are more than just daily trading figures; they represent a fundamental shift in how digital assets are perceived and integrated into the global financial system. The positive sentiment generated by these inflows could have several ripple effects: Increased Liquidity: As more capital flows into these ETFs, it enhances the overall liquidity of the Ethereum market, making it more stable and efficient. Price Discovery: Institutional participation can lead to more robust price discovery mechanisms, potentially reducing volatility over the long term. Mainstream Adoption: The success of Ethereum ETFs paves the way for further institutional adoption of other digital assets, broadening the scope of the crypto market. Regulatory Precedent: The operational success of these ETFs could encourage regulators in other jurisdictions to consider similar products, fostering global crypto integration. While the initial inflows are promising, it’s crucial to remember that the ETF market is dynamic. Future performance will depend on sustained investor interest, overall market conditions, and regulatory developments. However, this strong start lays a solid foundation for Ethereum’s journey into mainstream finance. What Does This Mean for You, the Investor? For both seasoned crypto enthusiasts and newcomers, the emergence and success of spot Ethereum ETFs offer new avenues and considerations: Accessibility: If direct crypto ownership feels daunting, ETFs provide a regulated, familiar wrapper to gain exposure. Diversification: Consider how Ethereum ETFs fit into your existing investment portfolio, offering diversification beyond Bitcoin or traditional assets. Long-Term View: The institutional interest suggests a long-term belief in Ethereum’s utility and growth. While short-term volatility is always a factor in crypto, these inflows point towards a maturing asset class. Stay Informed: Keep an eye on ongoing inflow/outflow data, regulatory updates, and Ethereum’s ecosystem developments to make informed decisions. A Glimpse into Ethereum’s Bright Future The remarkable $100.73 million in net inflows into U.S. spot Ethereum ETFs on June 23 marks a significant milestone. It’s a testament to Ethereum’s growing appeal and the increasing comfort of traditional finance with digital assets. As institutional giants like Fidelity and BlackRock continue to lead the charge, the path for Ethereum’s integration into mainstream investment portfolios appears clearer than ever. This initial surge of capital is not just a fleeting moment; it’s a powerful signal that the future of finance is increasingly intertwined with the innovation of blockchain technology. To learn more about the latest Ethereum ETF trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Ethereum institutional adoption. title: Bitcoin (BTC) $Price Rebounds Amid Fragile Israel-Iran Ceasefire
body: From some degree of panic among Bitcoin traders at $98,300, the $BTC price rebounded strongly on Monday to touch $106,000. With a somewhat patchy ceasefire now in force, there could be a calming of tensions in the Israel/Iran conflict. Will Bitcoin continue its latest rally? U.S. stock market: It’s like nothing happened Source: TradingView For the U.S. stock market it might have been that there was no escalating conflict in the Middle East. A strong trading day took the S&P 500 past the 6,000 point resistance with a near 1% move higher. As can be seen in the daily chart above, if the bulls can consolidate the price above 6,000, an all-time high will not be far away. That this recovery over the last few weeks has taken place amid huge geopolitical tensions and all the Trump tariffs repercussions says much for the inexorable march of increasing global liquidity. $BTC price shoots up to tag $106,000 resistance Source: TradingView The short-term time frame for $BTC reveals how the price shot up though resistance levels, flipping them into support, and how it just managed to touch the major resistance at $106,000 before falling back. Really, all this means is that the sideways price action has been regained, and any thoughts that the bears might have had to drag the price down much further have been stymied, at least for now. Now that the price has been rejected from $106,000, it may be that it turns back down as the short-term Stochastic RSIs seek to reset once again. This could take another few days. If the pullback is not too deep, this will give the bulls the chance to take out the $106,000 resistance on the next upward impulse. Bullish descending channel on daily time frame Source: TradingView Moving out into the daily time frame it does look like a large descending channel may have formed. This is generally a bullish candle pattern and the price has a greater expectation of exiting from the top rather than the bottom of the channel. Looking at the Stochastic RSI for the daily, it can be seen that the indicator lines are rising nicely from the bottom, indicating positive price momentum. At the very bottom of the chart is the RSI. This is showing that the indicator line has crossed above the yellow moving average line and could be about to cross up through the downtrend. Success or rejection could depend on today’s price action. Disclaimer: This article is provided for informational purposes only. It is not offered or intended to be used as legal, tax, investment, financial, or other advice.

title: Ripple to Settle SEC Fine in Cash, Not XRP, Former SEC Official Confirms
body: Ripple will pay SEC fine in cash, not XRP, ending related market rumors. XRP price rose 7% after legal clarity; government seizure claims dismissed. Judge Torres’ ruling on settlement motion will likely speed case resolution. Former U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) official Marc Fagel has confirmed that the settlement payment from Ripple Labs to the agency is secured in cash and will not be paid using XRP tokens. The clarification refutes widespread social media rumors that the fine would be settled with XRP, a scenario that had raised concerns about potential market impact. Fagel stated that the payment is held within an escrow account, eliminating any risk of XRP token transfers as part of the settlement. The news brought some clarity to the market, with the price of XRP rising 7%. They’re not paying in XRP. It’s sitting in an escrow account in cash. — Marc Fagel (@Marc_Fagel) June 22, 2025 Experts Refute Broader Lawsuit Rumors The misinformation surrounding Ripple’s payment method sparked concerns that the SEC fine could be paid in XRP tokens. body: Crypto markets are buzzing again. After a sluggish start to the year, June 2025 is shaping up as a turning point—where market momentum, social sentiment, and raw innovation align across select tokens. But here’s the twist: it’s not just the usual suspects. New contenders are emerging from both ends of the crypto spectrum. With crypto markets gearing up for renewed momentum, June 2025 highlighted six coins showing strong signs of breakout potential. As attention shifts toward innovative Layer-1s and meme-driven ecosystems, here’s who’s leading the pack — and why one token might even threaten Cardano’s throne. Solana (SOL) Solana is reaffirming its strength in June, holding firm above the crucial support range around $140–$150. Fintech giants like R3 have backed a recent bloom in DeFi and developer activity. They partnered with banks such as HSBC and the Monetary Authority of Singapore to integrate Solana’s chain for asset tokenization. With ecosystem revenues surpassing $1 billion over two quarters and a network boasting over 3,200 developers, Solana remains at the forefront of scalable blockchain solutions. As demand for high-throughput chains increases, SOL looks ready to rally past its all-time high this year. Fartcoin (FARTCOIN) Fartcoin is still riding the meme coin rollercoaster—but the hype has cooled off quite a bit lately. After a peak near $1.50 earlier in June, it’s now trading around $0.86. Its market cap is hovering near $850 million. It’s one of the more active meme tokens listed on major exchanges like Coinbase and Binance in the US. While volatile and high-risk, Fartcoin’s current trend gains traction as meme season intensifies, offering outsized gains for risk-tolerant investors. Toncoin (TON) Toncoin has recently dipped below the $3 mark, currently trading around $2.70–$2.80. It had been in a $3.00–$3.20 consolidation zone, but that level recently broke downward. Analyst sentiment is mixed; technical indicators lean bearish in the short term. On the other hand, its integration with Telegram’s crypto ecosystem remains its strongest long-term thesis. The narrative still holds: TON benefits from real-world usage inside a massive messaging platform. With growing usage across the Open Network (TON) blockchain for messaging, DeFi, and tokenized assets, it could rebound and spark serious investor interest. Sui (SUI) Sui has grabbed headlines in June by retesting previous highs near $4–$5. This was driven by bullish 50-day EMA crossovers and growing anticipation of listing on major platforms, such as Robinhood. While June saw weakness in the range of $2.09–$2.26, analysts remain optimistic about a rebound to $5–$7 if its ecosystem continues to mature. As a next-gen Layer-1 with rapid throughput and a budding developer base, Sui is a proven breakout candidate. Virtuals Protocol (VIRTUAL) Virtuals Protocol has posted strong annual growth, though recent performance shows over 30% correction. Still, its $1.30 market price ranks it comfortably within the top 100 cryptos. The token draws attention for powering on-chain virtual asset platforms, and its recent 52% monthly growth suggests strong cyclical upside. For investors tracking tech-forward Layer-1 infrastructure, VIRTUAL offers high-beta exposure in a still-developing niche. Little Pepe (LILPEPE) – the meme-layer challenger to ADA Little Pepe ($LILPEPE) stands out as a powerhouse in the meme space, but what truly sets it apart is its ambition to rival chains like Cardano. $LILPEPE is the brainchild of meme coin veterans, packaged not as a token but as a dedicated Layer‑2 blockchain built for meme token deployment. Currently in Stage 3 of its presale at $0.0012, the project has raised over $1.69 million and sold nearly 1.55 billion of its 2.25 billion token supply in Stage three. This isn’t a slapdash project. Core features include a zero-tax environment, anti-bot launch safeguards, and a built-in Pepe’s Pump Pad launchpad for vetting and deploying new meme tokens with locked liquidity. Tokenomics support long-term engagement with 13.5% earmarked for staking, while liquidity and marketing allocations ensure sustainable growth. Where ADA thrives on careful rollouts and governance, Little Pepe is targeting a new era of meme-first blockchain design. Its ease of use, low cost, and immersive community hype give it a real shot at siphoning early adopter attention and capital. And influencers are strongly behind it. These influencers have promoted Little Pepe across various platforms, sparking major conversations about this new ADA challenger. Early adopters can enter before the next price tier is $0.0013. With planned ecosystem expansion (launchpad, staking, CEX listings), Little Pepe is well-positioned to outperform traditional meme coins and legacy Layer-1 players in an environment where speculative adoption is key. Little Pepe offers an almost unfair advantage: timing, structure, and narrative fuel its climb to prominence. Conclusion June’s crypto pulse is precise: investors are shifting toward innovation-focused projects with developer traction, memetic momentum, or both. Solana and Sui anchor the utility side, while Fartcoin and Virtuals offer high-beta meme exposure. Toncoin is a sleeper pick gaining institutional and on-chain activity. In the center stands Little Pepe —not only the strongest meme-layer candidate but also a direct challenger to chains like Cardano in terms of narrative, community, and tokenomics design. If 2025’s bull cycles reward speed, hype, and breakout capability, these six are poised for the next wave. For more information about Little Pepe (LILPEPE) visit the links below: Website: https://littlepepe.com Whitepaper: https://littlepepe.com/whitepaper.pdf Telegram: https://t.me/littlepepetoken Twitter/X: https://x.com/littlepepetoken The post Top trending cryptos in June 2025: one is coming for ADA's market share appeared first on Invezz

title: Bitcoin Elliott Wave Count Predicts Further Crash To $94,000, But What Next?
body: Bitcoin (BTC) has been facing significant volatility and downward pressure lately. However, analysts warn that the downtrend may not be over yet, as projections point to a deeper price crash toward $94,000 soon. According to Bitcoin’s Elliott Wave count, the cryptocurrency is currently in a vulnerable phase that may trigger more losses, despite the market’s efforts to rebound. Still, the analyst notes that the next move after this projected crash could see Bitcoin potentially reversing upward to new levels. Bitcoin Faces Epic Crash As Wave 2 Unfolds Luca, a crypto analyst on X (formerly Twitter), has unveiled a foreboding forecast for the Bitcoin price, warning that the flagship cryptocurrency could still be headed for more pain in the short term. The analyst has outlined an Elliott Wave count for Bitcoin that suggests that the cryptocurrency has not bottomed yet. Related Reading: Bitcoin Bullish Divergence That Appeared Before The May ATH Has Returned Again According to the 8-hour chart breakdown, Bitcoin is in the midst of completing a Wave 2 correction within a broader bullish trend. The chart shows a five-wave corrective structure unfolding, with the final leg potentially leading to a price crash toward the $94,000 support region. This level aligns with both the 0.382 Fibonacci Retracement and a key support zone. While Luca reveals that some signs indicate that the correction might have bottomed already, the analyst maintains that one final push lower remains possible before Bitcoin’s next bullish move. The projected dip toward $94,000 is framed as the concluding move of the internal Wave (v) of Wave 2, creating what could be a textbook completion of a corrective cycle. With the Bitcoin price currently sitting above the $100,000 psychological level at $105,574, a decline to $94,000 would represent a massive blow to its slowly recovering value. Despite the possibility of an upcoming bullish move, this 11.3% decline from current prices could significantly slow down BTC’s momentum, putting more strain on the already volatile market. Nevertheless, Luca suggests that this decline could present a prime accumulation opportunity, indicating that now may be a favorable time to buy Bitcoin. Game-Changing Reversal With Wave 3 Push Despite the potential for a further pullback, Luca’s broader outlook for Bitcoin remains highly bullish. The Elliott Wave count on the chart signals that BTC is preparing to exit Wave 2 and initiate Wave 3—one of the most powerful phases in the five-wave structure. Once the projected correction to the $94,000 level concludes, Luca expects a strong reversal that could catapult the cryptocurrency to new ATHs. Related Reading: Crypto Pundit Reveals Why This Bitcoin Bull Market Feels Different As Crypto Enters ‘New Era’ A large purple upward arrow on the chart visualizes the anticipated Wave 3 surge, pointing toward a possible target zone above $122,000. This projection is rooted in the technical and historical tendency for Wave 3 to be the steepest and most aggressive wave in the Elliott Wave cycle. With Bitcoin still hovering near a high-confluence support zone, the stage appears set for a decisive rebound in the coming weeks, provided macro conditions don’t shift dramatically. Featured image from Pixabay, chart from Tradingview.com
tags: Bitcoin|bitcoin|Bitcoin news|bitcoin price|btc|BTC news|btc price|btcusd|BTCUSDT|elliot wave theory|fibonacci retracement|Luca

title: The UK's CMA wants to reduce Google's control over its search engine
body: The UK’s Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is proposing to designate Google with “strategic market status” (SMS) under the new Digital Markets, Competition and Consumers Act 2024, in an attempt to curb its dominance in online search and search advertising. According to the Competition and Markets Authority, Google could be required to implement new “fair ranking” measures in its search results and give publishers more control over how it uses their content, including in output generated by artificial intelligence. The CMA has justified granting Google “strategic market status” — a label introduced under new digital market laws this year — because of its dominant position in search and search advertising, which would require the tech giant to abide by a number of such conduct rules. CMA takes first steps to improve competition in search services in the UK. We’ve proposed to designate Google with strategic market status under the new Digital Markets Competition Regime. https://t.co/hla7I5b56K — Competition & Markets Authority (@CMAgovUK) June 24, 2025 Regulator accuses Google of using market power to stifle competition A final decision is expected to come by October following a public consultation. However, it does not seem like Google is willing to let the attack slide. The search engine company has tagged the proposals “broad and unfocused,” even claiming they could threaten the UK’s access to its latest products and services. The Big Tech giant was one of the first companies to be targeted under strict new digital laws, which require businesses with an outsized impact in certain digital markets to be granted the SMS label and subjected to specific rules. The CMA’s investigation, which began in January, has been trying to determine whether Google’s position in search and advertising is “delivering good outcomes” for people and businesses in the UK. It found that Google’s dominance actually makes the cost of search advertising “higher than would be expected” in a more competitive market. CMA Chief Executive Sarah Cardell concedes that Google’s search engine has delivered significant benefits; however, the regulator sees opportunities to make the market more competitive and innovative. Other key proposals the CMA is considering include: requirements in how it ranks its search results and for Google’s distribution partners, who include Apple, to offer “choice screens” which could help people more easily switch between search providers instead of being offered the world’s most used search engine by default. Google’s senior director for competition, Oliver Bethell, called the scope of the CMA’s considerations broad and unfocused, with a range of interventions being considered. According to him, “punitive regulations” could alter how quickly Google launches new products in the UK and ultimately become a roadblock to growth. Google struggles to stave off EU antitrust fines The CMA’s proposed enforcement draws comparisons to the EU’s Digital Markets Act (DMA), which has imposed stricter rules and hefty fines on the search engine giant for similar reasons. Some months ago, the European Commission accused Google of favoring its own services over rivals in breach of the Digital Markets Act (DMA). In response to that, Google proposed more changes to its search results to better showcase rivals. Under the new proposal, a vertical search service (VSS) selected on objective and non-discriminatory criteria would get its own box at the top of the search page with the same format, information and features as Google’s. The box would contain three direct links picked by the VSS, to hotels, airlines, restaurants and transport, while other VSS, which are specialized search engines within Google, would be ranked below but without a box unless users click on them. “We do not agree with the (Commission’s) preliminary findings’ position but, on a without prejudice basis, we want to find a workable solution to resolve the present proceedings,” the documents sent by both Google and the Commission to the rivals read. The proposals to adjust search result displays have been deemed insufficient by competitors. The CMA’s approach is described as more targeted than the EU’s, even though concerns remain about enforcement effectiveness and Google’s ability to adapt without significant market share loss. title: U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs Witness Explosive $350M Inflow Surge
body: BitcoinWorld U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs Witness Explosive $350M Inflow Surge The world of digital finance is currently witnessing an exhilarating phenomenon: the relentless surge of capital into U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs. For an unprecedented tenth consecutive trading day, these groundbreaking investment vehicles have recorded substantial net inflows, culminating in a remarkable $350.48 million on June 23 alone. This sustained accumulation is not merely a fleeting trend; it’s a powerful affirmation of Bitcoin’s burgeoning role in mainstream finance and a clear indicator of burgeoning institutional confidence. The Unstoppable Momentum of U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs: A New Era for Digital Assets? The consistent performance of U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs has captured the attention of investors worldwide. This impressive streak of net inflows, now spanning ten trading days, signifies a pivotal shift in the investment landscape. What began as a niche asset for early adopters has rapidly evolved into a legitimate component of diversified portfolios, largely facilitated by the accessibility and regulatory clarity offered by these ETFs. This sustained accumulation points to several fundamental drivers: Institutional Validation: Major financial institutions, pension funds, and wealth managers are increasingly comfortable allocating capital to Bitcoin through these regulated products, viewing them as a safer and more compliant entry point than direct cryptocurrency purchases. Ease of Access: For a vast segment of the investment community, particularly those operating under strict mandates or preferring traditional brokerage platforms, spot Bitcoin ETFs remove significant barriers to entry, simplifying exposure to the digital asset. Market Maturation: The consistent demand from institutional players contributes significantly to the overall maturation and stability of the cryptocurrency market, gradually reducing its perceived volatility and enhancing its appeal as a long-term store of value. Macroeconomic Hedging: In an era of persistent inflation concerns and economic uncertainty, Bitcoin’s narrative as a potential hedge against traditional financial system vulnerabilities continues to resonate with sophisticated investors. The cumulative effect of these factors is creating a robust demand environment for Bitcoin, with ETFs acting as the primary conduit for this institutional capital. Diving Deep into Bitcoin ETF Inflows: Who’s Leading the Charge in This Financial Revolution? A closer examination of the specific contributions to these monumental Bitcoin ETF inflows reveals a dynamic competitive landscape among the various fund providers. On June 23, the distribution of inflows highlighted clear market leaders: ETF Ticker Provider Net Inflow (USD) IBIT BlackRock $217.65 million FBTC Fidelity $105.66 million BITB Bitwise $14.57 million BTC Grayscale (mini BTC) $10.06 million BTCO Invesco $6.18 million ARKB Ark Invest $2.05 million As the table illustrates, BlackRock’s IBIT and Fidelity’s FBTC continue to dominate, leveraging their brand recognition, extensive distribution networks, and competitive fee structures to attract the lion’s share of new capital. This strong performance by traditional financial powerhouses underscores the significant shift of institutional funds into the digital asset space. Understanding the Dynamics of BTC ETFs: Winners, Outliers, and Market Evolution While the overall trend for BTC ETFs is undeniably positive, it’s essential to analyze the nuances within the market. On June 23, one significant outlier was Grayscale’s GBTC, which recorded a net outflow of $5.69 million. This outflow, while modest compared to the massive inflows into other funds, is part of a broader, ongoing trend for GBTC since its conversion from a trust to a spot ETF in January. Early investors, who previously faced limited redemption options, are now able to exit their positions, often migrating to newer, more cost-effective Bitcoin ETF alternatives. This dynamic is a natural consequence of increased competition and market maturity. The remaining ETFs in the market reported no change in their holdings for the day, indicating stability in their existing investor base. The emergence of these diverse ETF options has created a more competitive environment, ultimately benefiting investors by offering a range of choices with varying fee structures and management styles. BlackRock IBIT’s Dominance: A Closer Look at the Institutional Behemoth The consistent and overwhelming success of BlackRock IBIT in attracting significant capital is a defining narrative in the current Bitcoin ETF landscape. On June 23, IBIT alone accounted for over 60% of the total net inflows, pulling in $217.65 million. This sustained leadership can be attributed to several strategic advantages: Brand Trust: BlackRock’s unparalleled reputation as the world’s largest asset manager instills immense confidence in institutional and retail investors alike. Vast Distribution Network: Their extensive reach across financial advisors, brokerages, and institutional clients provides a direct pipeline for capital. Competitive Fees: While not the absolute lowest, IBIT’s fee structure is highly competitive, making it an attractive long-term holding. Proactive Engagement: BlackRock has actively engaged with the crypto community and regulators, demonstrating a serious commitment to the asset class. IBIT’s performance is a strong indicator that institutional capital is not just testing the waters but making substantial, long-term commitments to Bitcoin. This fund’s continued growth sets a benchmark for the industry and signals a robust appetite for regulated Bitcoin exposure. Grayscale GBTC: Navigating the Outflow Landscape and Future Prospects The story of Grayscale GBTC is one of transformation and adaptation. For years, it served as the primary, albeit imperfect, vehicle for U.S. investors to gain Bitcoin exposure through a regulated product. However, its conversion to a spot ETF unleashed significant selling pressure. The $5.69 million outflow on June 23 is a continuation of this trend, as investors move out of what was once a premium-traded trust into more liquid, lower-fee ETF options. Many long-term holders are realizing gains or reallocating their capital to optimize their investment strategies. Despite the outflows, GBTC remains the largest Bitcoin ETF by assets under management. Its future trajectory will depend on its ability to retain its remaining investor base and potentially attract new capital if its fee structure becomes more competitive. The outflows are not necessarily a negative reflection on Bitcoin itself, but rather a reflection of market efficiency and investor preference for more optimized products. Broader Implications: What Do These Sustained Inflows Mean for Bitcoin’s Future? The consistent net inflows into U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs carry profound and far-reaching implications for Bitcoin and the entire cryptocurrency ecosystem. They suggest: Enhanced Price Stability: The steady absorption of Bitcoin by large institutional players can reduce market volatility and provide a more stable price floor, as significant buying pressure offsets potential sell-offs. Accelerated Mainstream Adoption: The success of these ETFs serves as a powerful catalyst for Bitcoin’s integration into traditional financial portfolios, encouraging broader acceptance among conservative investors and financial advisors. Increased Liquidity and Market Depth: As more capital flows into the market through ETFs, the overall liquidity of Bitcoin increases, making it easier for large transactions to occur without significant price impact. Regulatory Confidence: The sustained interest and capital commitment from regulated entities signal growing confidence in the evolving regulatory landscape surrounding digital assets, potentially paving the way for further innovation and product development. Potential for Supply Shock: With a finite supply of Bitcoin, continuous large-scale accumulation by ETFs could eventually lead to a supply crunch, potentially driving up the asset’s value in the long term if demand continues to outpace available supply. While the cryptocurrency market will always retain a degree of volatility, the robust demand evidenced by these ETF inflows provides a compelling bullish narrative for Bitcoin’s long-term trajectory and its eventual role as a cornerstone of the global financial system. Actionable Insights for Investors: Navigating the Bitcoin ETF Landscape For both seasoned crypto enthusiasts and newcomers, the success of spot Bitcoin ETFs offers valuable insights: For New Investors: These ETFs provide a straightforward, regulated, and secure way to gain exposure to Bitcoin without the complexities of managing private keys or navigating cryptocurrency exchanges. It’s an ideal entry point for those looking for traditional investment vehicles. For Existing Bitcoin Holders: While direct ownership remains a popular choice, ETFs can be used for diversification within a portfolio, or for tax-advantaged accounts where direct crypto ownership might be complicated. Consider Fees: Always compare the expense ratios of different ETFs. While BlackRock and Fidelity lead in inflows, other funds might offer competitive or even lower fees that could impact long-term returns. Understand Volatility: Even with institutional adoption, Bitcoin remains a volatile asset. Investors should only allocate capital they are prepared to lose and ensure it aligns with their risk tolerance and investment horizon. Stay Informed: The market is dynamic. Keep an eye on ongoing inflows/outflows, regulatory developments, and broader macroeconomic trends that could influence Bitcoin’s price and ETF performance. These ETFs are not just a product; they are a bridge, connecting the burgeoning world of digital assets with the established architecture of traditional finance. In conclusion, the astounding run of ten consecutive days of net inflows into U.S. spot Bitcoin ETFs, capped by the impressive $350.48 million on June 23, unequivocally underscores Bitcoin’s growing acceptance and formidable presence in mainstream investment portfolios. This relentless capital infusion, spearheaded by giants like BlackRock’s IBIT and supported by other major players, signals a profound shift from speculative interest to strategic institutional allocation. While Grayscale’s GBTC navigates its unique transition, the overall narrative is one of robust demand, increasing liquidity, and an accelerating pathway towards Bitcoin’s full integration into global finance. This trend not only validates Bitcoin’s resilience and potential but also sets a powerful precedent for its continued ascent as a legitimate and indispensable asset in the evolving economic landscape. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin institutional adoption. This post U.S. Spot Bitcoin ETFs Witness Explosive $350M Inflow Surge first appeared on BitcoinWorld and is written by Editorial Team

title: Shiba Inu Team: It’s Not Over Until SHIB Wins
body: Over the weekend, Shiba Inu faced a significant decline in value, driven by an unexpected shift in global events. As fear swept through financial markets due to a worsening geopolitical crisis, Shiba Inu’s team issued a statement aimed at restoring calm and reaffirming its long-term commitment. Geopolitical Shockwaves Hit Crypto Markets The broader cryptocurrency sector endured heavy losses after international tensions reached a new high point. The catalyst came when President Donald Trump announced that U.S. military forces had neutralized three nuclear facilities in Iran. This move followed increasingly aggressive warnings from Iran’s Supreme Leader, who vowed consequences if the U.S. intervened in its confrontation with Israel. This escalation introduced a wave of uncertainty, triggering a rapid selloff across digital asset markets, causing assets like XRP to briefly lose crucial support . Amid the chaos, many traders sought to limit risk, and Shiba Inu was among the cryptocurrencies hit hard by this downward movement. Shiba Inu Community Urged to Avoid Rash Decisions Amid this downturn, Shiba Inu’s leadership moved swiftly to address the community. Lucie (@LucieSHIB), the project’s lead on marketing and communications, encouraged supporters to avoid panic and maintain confidence in the project’s direction. Rather than making short-term decisions based on price movements, she emphasized the importance of staying committed to the broader vision. Her statement positioned the recent price action as temporary and disconnected from Shiba Inu’s long-term trajectory. In her words, “If we haven’t won yet, it’s because it’s not over.” Panic is not an option. If we haven’t won yet, it’s because it’s not over. — 𝐋𝐔𝐂𝐈𝐄 (@LucieSHIB) June 22, 2025 We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 SHIB Hits Lowest Point Since February 2024 As the selling pressure intensified, Shiba Inu’s price slid to $0.00001010, marking its lowest level since February 2024. Although the token has recovered most of its losses, the drop has renewed anxiety among community members who are closely watching market conditions. The situation shows the fragility of sentiment during global instability, as even assets with dedicated communities and active development can be impacted by external forces beyond their control. Other negative events, such as the recent theft and destruction of over $90 million in digital assets from Nobitex, Iran’s largest crypto exchange, have contributed to the bearish market pressure. Optimism About SHIB Future Remains Intact Lucie has previously spoken about ambitious targets for SHIB, including the possibility of the token reaching $0.01 , and even floated a hypothetical scenario in which SHIB climbs as high as $1 . However, she has made it clear that these are long-range goals, not short-term predictions, and should be understood in that context. Currently, SHIB trades at $0.00001157, showing a weekly decline of just over 2% as it is slowly building its way back up. title: XRP Price Prediction Today: 24th June
body: The post XRP Price Prediction Today: 24th June appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News XRP climbed 14% over the past 24 hours to reclaim the $2 mark. The rally came after a ceasefire was announced to ease escalating geopolitical tensions. The price surge followed a turbulent weekend driven by U.S. and Israeli military activity on Iran, making it a bearish June’s third week. With Monday’s advancement, a new week has begun for the XRP price . XRP Price Prediction For Next 24 Hours Metric Price (USD) Reason 24H High $2.33 Projected strong resistance level; target if bullish momentum continues. 24H Low $2.08 Key support zone; losing this may break short-term bullish structure. 24H Average Price $2.20 – $2.23 Estimated average based on recovery from $1.90 and current range movement. XRP Price Dips to Monthly Low Amid Geopolitical Tensions The 3-hour chart displays the impact of recent geopolitical events that briefly pushed the XRP price below the key multi-day psychological support zone. As a result, XRP price marked June month’s low at $1.90 from $2.33, eroding 18%. However, the XRP crypto showed immediate recovery on June 23rd. When writing, the recovery from the “weak low” has pushed XRP price 14% higher to $2.18, with $5.15 billion 24-hour trading volume and $129.08 Billion market capitalization. The short-term recovery has changed the short-term trend as it has broken the 20-day and 50-day EMA bands, and as a result, the short-term structure has attained a “Change of Character (ChoCh).” The reason behind the rise was a short-term bullish conviction developed by the ceasefire news. This is also evident on-chain, as whale transaction count has increased, and exchange outflow has spiked. This shows that investors have not panicked as much as they did in the last few months, which is evident in evaluating metrics like age consumed and network realized profit/loss. .article-inside-link { margin-left: 0 !important; border: 1px solid #0052CC4D; border-left: 0; border-right: 0; padding: 10px 0; text-align: left; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li { font-size: 14px; line-height: 21px; font-weight: 600; list-style-type: none; margin-bottom: 0; display: inline-block; } .entry ul.article-inside-link li:last-child { display: none; } Also Read : What’s Next for XRP, ADA, and BTC Prices? , This indicates that a lot of buying on the dip happened, then panic selling, and it appears that the short-term rally is not over yet. 7% Move on the Horizon? Key Levels to Watch There are higher odds that in the next 24 hours, the continued “break of structure (BoS)” could take XRP price towards the short-term trend’s “strong high” at $2.33, which is a critical resistance level for tomorrow. XRP is trading around $2.18 today, having recently climbed 14% to reclaim the $2 mark. This rally follows a turbulent period driven by geopolitical tensions, indicating a short-term bullish recovery for the asset. How did geopolitical tensions impact XRP’s price? Escalating U.S. and Israeli military activity on Iran created bearish pressure, pushing XRP to a monthly low of $1.90. However, a ceasefire announcement quickly fueled a 14% recovery. What price will XRP reach in 2025? XRP could reach up to $5.81 in 2025, supported by institutional demand and Ripple’s growing global adoption.

title: Bubblemaps price prediction – BMT continues its ascent, is ATH next?
body: Bubblemaps has held its bull trend quite well despite many altcoins dumping to new lows. Since 15th June, this token has pumped by almost 37%, and many still believe there is more upside. Is that the case, or is a retracement due? Let’s find that out in detail in this Bubblemaps price prediction. Table of Contents What is Bubblemaps? Bubblemaps price prediction Bubblemaps coin price prediction: short-term outlook Bubblemaps price prediction 2025 Bubblemaps price prediction 2030 Since its launch, Bubblemaps ( BMT ) has reached an all-time high of $0.3280, followed by a 143.92% price drop. At the time of writing, it is currently trading at $0.1349 and closing in on its previous monthly high of $0.1921. BMT 1d chart, Source: Tradingview In this article, we’ll discuss BMT price prediction by giving you its short-term and long-term price forecasts and exploring whether this token can continue its bullish run. You might also like: Bubblemaps V2 goes live on Open Network What is Bubblemaps? Bubblemaps is widely used for supply analysis and token research, and it helps with on-chain investigations that have influenced conversations concerning token concentration and insider activities. With integrations with Pump.fun, Etherscan, Photon, and DEX Screener, the platform attracts more than 1 million visits each month. Now that “bubble map” is a phrase rather than merely our brand, bubblemaps is ingrained in the crypto culture. When assessing new initiatives, institutions are increasingly using address connectivity and token concentration as important criteria. With €3M in 2023 and an extra €3.5M in 2024 raised from a combination of traditional money and blockchain technologies, Bubblemaps has gathered substantial financial support. These grants have sped up platform development and made it possible for Bubblemaps to continue growing its footprint in various ecosystems. Now let’s discuss BMT price prediction for this year and in the coming years as well. Bubblemaps price prediction What can be a realistic projection for the BMT token? Let’s dive into the BMT price prediction for 2025 and 2030. Bubblemaps coin price prediction: short-term outlook According to CoinCodex’s Bubblemaps price prediction for the near future, the token is projected to drop by -25.22% and reach $0.105093 by July 23, 2025. As of June. 24th, 2025, the overall sentiment of the BMT price outlook is bullish, with 9 technical analysis indicators showing bullish signals, 1 indicating a bearish trend, and 11 indicators showing neutral forecasts. Bubblemaps price prediction 2025 For the remaining months of 2025, DigitalCoinPrice predicts that the BMT token’s price could fluctuate between $0.12 and $0.29, and may likely hold a yearly average of $0.27. CoinCodex projects that the BMT token can trade in the price channel of $0.097928 and $0.140529 in 2025. While the general sentiment in the financial markets is that 2025 will be the year of the bull, it is essential to recognize that this prediction also carries a risk of being incorrect. BTC has already breached the $100k mark, and there is a possibility that it may be at the top of this bull cycle. Hence, it is advised to do your research before investing in BMT or any other cryptocurrency with the hopes of gaining on your investment in 2025. Bubblemaps price prediction 2030 As per CoinCodex’s Bubblemaps crypto price prediction for 2030, BMT’s price could vary between $0.299035 and $0.542074. DigitalCoinPrice expects that BMT’s price could climb to $0.64 or $0.74 by the end of 2030. Before trusting any source that is trying to predict the BMT price prediction for 2030, you should understand that it is a cryptocurrency and, like all other tokens, the BMT token’s price can be highly volatile. 2030 is five years away, and many cryptocurrencies can become obsolete in that time. This is why it is hard to give a realistic price prediction for any token, including BMT. A great way for BMT to survive these five years and continue its ascent in the crypto market is to continue building its blockchain technology and partner with key players in the digital crypto space. You should research and keep yourself updated with the latest developments in the upcoming years to make an informed investment decision in the BMT token. You might also like: Bubblemaps V2 now public, unlocking advanced on-chain analytics features to all users Is Bubblemaps a good investment? Before investing in any cryptocurrency, including BMT, please identify and understand the inherent risks that can come due to market volatility. Additionally, it is worth noting that the sentiment in the cryptocurrency market can change rapidly, and a token that was once considered a future investment may also be delisted from major exchanges. Hence, it is advisable to do your research on the token’s fundamentals before having any price expectations for the future of the BMT token. Will Bubblemaps go up or down? Cryptocurrencies in general experience rapid price swings that are directly driven by market sentiments, community engagement, events like token burns, and so on. While it is challenging to predict the exact value of the BMT token, it is essential to watch for potential buying factors that may include new partnerships, increased token holders, or viral campaigns. It is also vital that you rely on financial experts and consult them for Bubblemaps price prediction, but even after all that, you should remain cautious, as no one can accurately predict how high or low BMT can go. Should I invest in Bubblemaps? Before investing in any cryptocurrency or relying on a Bubblemaps price forecast, please identify and understand the inherent risks associated with market volatility. Also, it should be noted that cryptocurrencies in general are a highly speculative investment, and their success not only relies on market volatility but also on the constant and sustainable growth of their community. Hence, it is advisable to do your research on the token’s fundamentals, which may very well decide the future of the BMT token. title: South Korea-Based Technology Company Bitmax Continues to Buy Bitcoin! Here is the Latest Purchase Amount!
body: South Korea-based financial technology company Bitmax announced that it has purchased a total of 49.06 more Bitcoins. Bitmax Buys Another 49.06 Bitcoins, Becoming South Korea’s Largest Institutional BTC Holder With this latest purchase, the company's total Bitcoin holdings reached 300.08 BTC. With this amount, Bitmax became the institution with the most Bitcoin among companies traded on the South Korean stock exchange. The company announced that it has completed a primary funding round of 50 billion Korean won (about $36 million) and raised a second round of 50 billion won. The company stated that it will continue its strategy of accumulating Bitcoin with these resources. This move by Bitmax shows that an increasing number of institutional investors are starting to embrace Bitcoin as a long-term strategic asset. Company officials stated that they closely follow global developments in digital asset markets and aim to make crypto assets an important part of the company's reserves. Bitmax’s aggressive BTC buying strategy is being watched closely not only by companies in South Korea but also by other companies in the Asian region, as the move is seen as an indication that institutional Bitcoin adoption is accelerating regionally. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: South Korea-Based Technology Company Bitmax Continues to Buy Bitcoin! Here is the Latest Purchase Amount!

title: Unlocking Your Home: How Cryptocurrency Holdings Could Transform Mortgage Qualification
body: BitcoinWorld Unlocking Your Home: How Cryptocurrency Holdings Could Transform Mortgage Qualification Are you a cryptocurrency enthusiast dreaming of owning a home? The recent announcement from the U.S. Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA) might just be the news you’ve been waiting for, or at least, a significant step towards clarity. William Pulte, Director of the FHFA, recently shared on X that the agency is embarking on a crucial study to understand how cryptocurrency holdings impact an individual’s eligibility for mortgages. This isn’t just a fleeting headline; it’s a potential game-changer that could redefine how digital assets are viewed in the traditional financial landscape, especially concerning mortgage qualification . What’s Driving the FHFA Crypto Policy Study? The FHFA, which oversees Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac – two giants in the U.S. housing finance market – plays a pivotal role in setting standards for mortgage lending. When Director Pulte announced the agency’s intention to delve into FHFA crypto policy , it signaled a recognition of the growing presence of digital assets in the financial portfolios of many Americans. For years, crypto holders have faced a unique hurdle when applying for home loans: how do lenders assess assets that are volatile, largely unregulated, and often held outside traditional banking systems? This study is a direct response to the evolving financial landscape. As more people accumulate significant wealth in cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum, the disconnect between their digital assets and their ability to qualify for a conventional mortgage has become increasingly apparent. The FHFA’s move suggests a proactive approach to bridge this gap, aiming to develop a more comprehensive and fair framework for evaluating these modern forms of wealth. The agency’s primary goal will likely be to understand the risks and opportunities associated with including crypto assets in mortgage underwriting. This includes addressing concerns around price volatility, regulatory compliance, and the liquidity of various digital assets. By initiating this study, the FHFA is taking a crucial step towards potentially integrating digital wealth into the mainstream housing finance system, a development that could have profound implications for millions. The FHFA’s groundbreaking study could reshape the future of homeownership for crypto holders. How Might Cryptocurrency Mortgages Evolve? Currently, using cryptocurrency mortgages as direct collateral or as proof of funds for a home loan is a complex and often prohibitive process. Traditional lenders prefer stable, easily verifiable assets like fiat currency in bank accounts, stocks, or bonds. The inherent volatility of cryptocurrencies makes them a risky proposition for lenders who need assurance that a borrower’s assets will maintain their value over the loan term. However, the FHFA study could pave the way for new approaches. Imagine a future where your Bitcoin holdings, perhaps converted into a stablecoin or held in a regulated trust, could contribute directly to your down payment or serve as a recognized asset for your loan application. This evolution wouldn’t happen overnight, but the study is the first critical step. Here’s a simplified comparison of how mortgage assessments might look today versus a potential future where crypto is integrated: Aspect Current Mortgage Assessment (Typical) Potential Future Mortgage Assessment (with Crypto Integration) Recognized Assets Bank deposits, stocks, bonds, retirement accounts. Traditional assets PLUS regulated crypto holdings (e.g., stablecoins, tokenized assets, verifiable exchange balances). Income Verification W-2s, pay stubs, tax returns, bank statements showing consistent income. Traditional income verification PLUS potentially verifiable crypto-derived income (e.g., staking rewards, DeFi yields, with clear tax records). Risk Assessment Credit score, debt-to-income ratio, stable asset valuation. Traditional metrics PLUS new frameworks for assessing crypto volatility and liquidity risk, potentially requiring specific types of crypto or holding periods. Collateral Options Primarily the property itself. Property PLUS potentially certain crypto assets as supplementary collateral, perhaps with higher loan-to-value (LTV) requirements or specific risk mitigations. This potential shift could open up homeownership to a segment of the population that has been effectively locked out due to their wealth being primarily in digital form. It signifies a move towards financial inclusivity, acknowledging modern wealth creation methods. Understanding the Crypto Impact on Mortgages: Challenges and Opportunities The crypto impact on mortgages is multifaceted, presenting both significant hurdles and exciting possibilities. Addressing these will be central to the FHFA’s study. Challenges: Price Volatility: The most obvious challenge. How can a lender rely on an asset that can fluctuate 20% or more in a single day? The study will need to explore mechanisms to mitigate this risk, perhaps through requiring higher reserves, using stablecoins, or implementing dynamic collateral adjustments. Regulatory Uncertainty: The lack of clear, comprehensive federal regulation for cryptocurrencies poses a significant hurdle. Lenders need clear guidelines on anti-money laundering (AML), know-your-customer (KYC) compliance, and how to handle crypto assets in the event of default or bankruptcy. Valuation and Custody: Accurately valuing diverse crypto assets, especially less liquid ones, is complex. Furthermore, secure custody solutions that are recognized and trusted by traditional financial institutions are essential. Source of Funds Verification: Lenders are legally obligated to verify the legitimate source of funds for down payments. Crypto transactions, especially those involving peer-to-peer transfers or older wallets, can be difficult to trace and verify to the stringent standards required for mortgage lending. Opportunities: Expanded Borrower Pool: Acknowledging crypto wealth could significantly expand the pool of eligible homebuyers, especially among younger generations who have embraced digital assets. Innovation in Lending: This could spur innovation in lending products, potentially leading to hybrid mortgages that blend traditional and crypto-backed elements, or even decentralized finance (DeFi) lending models that integrate with traditional real estate. Alternative Collateral: For borrowers with substantial crypto holdings but limited traditional liquid assets, their digital wealth could serve as supplementary collateral, potentially lowering interest rates or improving loan terms. Efficiency Gains: In the long term, if crypto rails are used for parts of the mortgage process (e.g., smart contracts for escrow), it could lead to faster, more transparent, and more efficient transactions. Navigating Mortgage Qualification Crypto: Actionable Insights for Homebuyers While the FHFA study is underway, crypto holders shouldn’t wait passively. Understanding how to best position your assets for future mortgage qualification crypto opportunities is crucial. Here are some actionable insights: Maintain Meticulous Records: Document every crypto transaction, including purchase dates, prices, and sources. This includes exchange statements, wallet histories, and any relevant tax forms. Transparency and verifiable records will be paramount. Understand Tax Implications: Ensure you are fully compliant with all tax regulations regarding your crypto holdings and any gains. Lenders will scrutinize your financial history, and clear tax records demonstrate financial responsibility. Consider “Seasoning” Your Crypto: If you anticipate using crypto for a down payment, consider converting a portion into fiat currency and holding it in a traditional bank account for several months (typically 60-90 days, known as “seasoning”). This makes the funds appear more stable and verifiable to lenders. Consult a Financial Advisor: Seek advice from a financial professional who understands both traditional finance and cryptocurrencies. They can help you structure your assets in a way that maximizes your chances of mortgage approval in the current and future landscapes. Stay Informed: Follow updates from the FHFA and other regulatory bodies. The outcome of this study will directly influence future mortgage guidelines. Build a Strong Credit Profile: Regardless of your crypto holdings, a robust credit score and a low debt-to-income ratio remain fundamental to mortgage qualification. By taking these proactive steps, you can better prepare yourself for a future where your digital assets might play a more direct role in your homeownership journey. The Future of Digital Asset Home Loans The FHFA’s study marks a significant turning point for digital asset home loans . While the immediate outcome is uncertain, the very act of undertaking this study signals a growing acceptance and seriousness with which traditional finance views cryptocurrencies. We could see several potential scenarios unfold: One possibility is the introduction of specific guidelines for how Fannie Mae and Freddie Mac should consider crypto assets. This might involve requiring crypto to be held with regulated custodians, specific seasoning periods, or limits on the percentage of crypto assets that can contribute to a down payment. Another outcome could be pilot programs that test new lending models, perhaps involving stablecoins as collateral or using blockchain technology for more efficient property title transfers. In the long term, this initiative could accelerate the integration of blockchain technology and digital assets into the broader real estate and lending ecosystems. Imagine tokenized real estate, where fractional ownership is facilitated by blockchain, or mortgages executed via smart contracts, reducing intermediaries and costs. While these are more futuristic visions, the FHFA’s current study lays the groundwork for such innovations by legitimizing the discussion around crypto and housing. This isn’t just about making it easier to buy a house with crypto; it’s about building a more inclusive and technologically advanced financial system that reflects the diverse ways individuals hold and manage their wealth in the 21st century. The study will undoubtedly lead to a more nuanced understanding of crypto’s role in personal finance, ultimately shaping policies that could benefit millions of aspiring homeowners. In conclusion, the FHFA’s decision to study the relationship between cryptocurrency holdings and mortgage qualification is a landmark event. It signifies a crucial step towards acknowledging digital assets within the traditional housing finance system. While challenges like volatility and regulatory uncertainty persist, the potential benefits—from expanding the pool of eligible homebuyers to fostering innovation in lending—are immense. For crypto holders, this is a call to action: stay informed, meticulously document your assets, and prepare for a future where your digital wealth could genuinely unlock the door to your dream home. This study isn’t just about policy; it’s about progress, paving the way for a more integrated and accessible financial future for all. title: D3 Unveils $1M USDC Developer Fund to Fuel Doma Testnet Momentum and DomainFi Innovation
body: New York, NY, June 24th, 2025, Chainwire D3 Global , a pioneer in DomainFi infrastructure, today announced a $1 million USDC grant program to support developers building on the newly launched Doma Protocol public testnet - a major milestone in bringing the $360B domain industry onchain as real-world assets (RWAs). The Doma Protocol testnet launch includes two groundbreaking initiatives: the Doma Forge developer ecosystem program and the Doma testnet app for domain investors (start.doma.xyz). Anchored by D3’s $1M USDC grant, the Doma Forge program offers developer-in-residence opportunities and technical resources to accelerate DomainFi innovation. The launch will bridge existing Web2 domains (e.g. .com, .xyz, .ai) and future Web3 extensions (e.g. .solana, .anime, .ape, .shib) into a global, interoperable marketplace for domains unlocking liquidity and utility across browsers, applications, and Web3 wallets. Doma Forge: The Epicenter of DomainFi Innovation Doma Forge is a new builder-first program designed to accelerate DomainFi innovation, enabling developers to build DApps using Doma’s robust infrastructure. Key components include: Access to a $1M USDC Developer Grant Pool : Ability to apply for funding to resource projects on Doma, from ideation to mainnet deployment. Developer-in-Residence Program : Opportunities to work alongside and receive mentorship from Doma technical experts. Open APIs and SDKs : Using open source tools and resources to build a range of DApps for DeFi, digital identity, and payment solutions using trusted domain data on Doma (pricing, history, state changes). Community Enablement : Accessing a vibrant network of Web3 users and builders, supported by venture capital partnerships like Paradigm and Coinbase Ventures. Ecosystem Integrations : Tapping into new distribution channels and infrastructure including Solana, Base, Avalanche, Animecoin, Celestia, Viction, and other major Web3 ecosystems. "Doma Forge is the catalyst for developers to build the next generation of DApps on Doma, leveraging a $1M USDC grant fund, technical resources, and integrations with Solana and Base. It’s where innovation meets opportunity to reshape domains as digital assets across Web3 ecosystems." said Inder Singh, VP of Product & Technology at D3. Doma Testnet App: Transforming How Domains are Owned, Used, and Traded The new Doma testnet app, accessible at start.doma.xyz, enables domain investors to trade tokenized domains as liquid, composable assets in a decentralized marketplace. With integrations underway with leading Web3 ecosystems like Solana, Base, and Avalanche, the app supports: Onchain Domain Synchronization : Ensuring real-world domain ownership integrity through DNS-compliant tokenization and cross-chain attestation infrastructure. Fractional Ownership : Enabling the division of premium domains into tradable shares. Lending and Trading : Facilitating access to DeFi liquidity pools for yield generation. Global Reach : Providing exposure to over 400 million crypto wallets and users as potential buyers and sellers. The Doma testnet app will allow investors to test these features with tokenized versions of existing domains (.com, .xyz, .ai) and future Web3 extensions (.sol, .anime, .ape, .shib), creating a seamless bridge between the existing internet and Web3 ecosystems. "Doma is a transformative step forward in making domains great again,” said Fred Hsu, CEO & Co-Founder, D3. “The testnet launch bridges tokenized domains across Web2 and Web3 and empowers investors and developers to reimagine domains as digital real estate for the global DomainFi economy." DomainFi: Bridging Web2 and Web3 DomainFi redefines the domain industry by transforming 364M+ domains into liquid, composable assets. The Doma Protocol ensures: Interoperability : Seamless functionality across websites, email, and Web3 wallets and marketplaces. ICANN Compliance : Maintains trust and compatibility with global domain standards. DeFi Utility : Enables lending, fractionalization, and yield generation for domains. Global Marketplace : Connects investors, builders, and users in a decentralized ecosystem.With integrations with Solana Record Service, Base and others TBA, Doma is poised to drive mass adoption of tokenized domains across major Web3 ecosystems. Accessing the Doma Testnet Domain Investors : Exploring the Doma Testnet application at https://start.doma.xyz/ . Developers : Applying to Doma Forge at https://doma.xyz/forge for grants and technical resources. Priority consideration will be given to applicants before July 31, 2025. Community : Following @DomaProtocol on X ( https://x.com/domaprotocol ) and joining the Doma Discord ( https://discord.com/invite/Doma ) for updates, AMAs, and testnet campaigns. Partnerships : Getting in touch via https://www.doma.xyz to explore collaborations and integrations. About D3 Global D3 Global is building the world's first DomainFi network to tokenize 362M+ existing and future domains as real-world assets. D3 unlocks the financial potential of domains by building on Doma Protocol, a decentralized blockchain infrastructure that bridges traditional Internet domains (.com, .net, .ai, and .org) and future domain extensions from the Web3 world (.sol, .anime, .shib, and .ape). Backed by Paradigm, the D3 team consists of industry veterans with over three decades of collective experience, known for leading domain name monetization, internet protocols, and various TLD operations including .xyz, .inc, .tv, and .link. Users can learn more about D3 at https://www.d3.com and Doma at https://www.doma.xyz . About Doma Protocol Doma Protocol is the world’s first DNS-compliant blockchain for DomainFi, tokenizing 364M+ domains as real-world assets (RWAs) to transform the $360B domain industry. Developed with contributions from D3 Global, Doma enables cross-chain interoperability between existing Web2 domains (.com, .xyz, .ai) and future Web3 extensions (.sol, .anime, .ape), powering a global economy for fractional ownership, lending, and DeFi utility. With open APIs, SDKs, and developer programs like Doma Forge, Doma Protocol empowers developers and investors to transform how domains are owned, used, and traded across the internet, marketplaces, and Web3 wallets. Users can learn more at https://www.doma.xyz | Testnet signup page | Doma Forge Contact Mr Jamie Kingsley D3 j.kingsley@theprgenius.com

title: US federal housing to look into crypto assets in mortgage qualifications - Bill Pulte
body: According to an announcement made on Monday by its new director, Bill Pulte, the US Federal Housing Finance Agency (FHFA) will begin a formal review of how crypto holdings could be factored into mortgage qualification processes. The 37-year-old businessman turned policymaker, sworn in as FHFA director on March 14 after being nominated by President Donald Trump, made the announcement via social media. “ We will study the usage of cryptocurrency holdings as it relates to qualifying for mortgages ,” he posted on X. We will study the usage pf cryptocurrency holdings as it relates to qualifying for mortgages. — Pulte (@pulte) June 24, 2025 The FHFA oversees most parameters of the US housing market, including Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac, and the Federal Home Loan Banks. It could push traditional mortgage lenders who have largely excluded crypto holdings from eligibility calculations to start accepting digital assets from homebuyers. Pulte pushes for crypto-backed house mortgages Pulte is the founder of Pulte Capital Partners and the grandson of William Pulte, who founded Pulte Homes, currently the third-largest homebuilder in the United States. His financial disclosures earlier this year revealed that he holds between $500,001 and $1,000,000 each in Bitcoin and Solana. The crypto-related investments also include shares in Marathon Digital Holdings , now rebranded as MARA, the well-known US-based bitcoin mining company. The portfolio also carries meme stocks like GameStop and Bed Bath & Beyond, and shares in Tesla, Palantir, and ventures linked to YouTube celebrity MrBeast. Pulte made his first crypto purchase of 11 BTC in 2019, in which he later pledged to give away crypto to followers on X, although the post is now de l eted . He is also a known supporter of Donald Trump’s political campaign, having donated $6,600 to the president’s 2024 re-election bid, along with contributions to Save America PAC and the Republican National Committee, according to filings by OpenSecrets. Crypto could be considered in mortgage lending Under current lending standards, most US mortgage providers do not accept direct crypto payments like Bitcoin or Ethereum to service home loans. Yet, proceeds from the sale of cryptocurrencies can be used for down payments or to cover closing costs, provided the funds can be verified and documented. Steven Glick, director of mortgage sales at HomeAbroad, notes that lenders prioritize the stability and traceability of funds. “ The lender needs to see that your funds are stable and not borrowed ,” Glick said. He explained that borrowers must convert their crypto holdings to US dollars through recognized exchanges like Coinbase or Kraken, then transfer the proceeds to a conventional bank account. Andrew Lokenauth, a personal finance consultant, explained to the Mortgage Research Network about a client who successfully converted $100,000 in Ethereum into a mortgage down payment. “ We documented every step, including the sale on Coinbase, the transfer to his bank, and two months of statements showing the money remained there ,” Lokenauth said. “ The rule of thumb is that a clean paper trail equals a happy mortgage underwriter. ” Documentation must include transaction records from the crypto exchange, deposit confirmations from the bank, and at least 60 days of “seasoning” where funds remain untouched. Lenders may also require evidence that the crypto was not obtained through a loan or margin account to comply with anti-money laundering regulations. “ If you can’t prove it, in the lender’s eyes you don’t own it ,” insisted mortgage advisor Cooling, reiterating that undocumented funds could disqualify a borrower. Outside of traditional banking, a group of crypto lenders could soon begin offering mortgage services based on digital assets. Thomas Franklin, CEO and founder of Swapped.com, a crypto brokerage firm, reckons the “fear” over crypto mortgages is often exaggerated. title: Fact Check: Are Abu Dhabi Taxis Accepting Crypto Payments with AE Coin?
body: The post Fact Check: Are Abu Dhabi Taxis Accepting Crypto Payments with AE Coin? appeared first on Coinpedia Fintech News Abu Dhabi has just made history and has taken a major step forward in digital innovation. Passengers can now pay for their taxi rides using AE Coin through the AEC Wallet app, across all Tawasul taxis in the Emirate of Abu Dhabi. AbuDhabi’s Push for Smart Mobility This milestone is part of a broader push to improve digital payments and create a smarter, safer, and more seamless travel experience. This is the first time anywhere in the world that a stablecoin pegged to the UAE dirham is being used for public transport. The initiative is launched by Tawasul Transport in partnership with Al Maryah Community Bank and the Integrated Transport Center (ITC). Easy, Secure Taxi Payments with AE Coin The AEC Wallet makes paying for taxis easy and secure, as passengers simply scan a QR code inside the vehicle to complete their ride. AE Coin is pegged 1:1 with the UAE dirham, offering price stability and boosting confidence in using digital currency. The app is free to download on the Apple Store, Google Play, and Huawei AppGallery. It is designed for fast, low-cost transactions with strong security features. The new system supports the city’s push for digital growth and helps strengthen its role as a global leader in fintech and smart transport. Mr. Ghena Jbour, General Manager of Tawasul Transport, said- “This initiative serves as a model of effective collaboration between all entities striving for continuous development within the integrated transport ecosystem. It reinforces the UAE’s leading position in innovation and digital transformation in the transportation sector.” He added that the use of AE Coin in public transport shows their commitment to future-ready financial solutions that blend technology, ease of use, and sustainability. AE Coin To Expand to More Services The AEC Wallet app is set to expand across more transportation services, retail stores, and merchants throughout the UAE. This will offer users greater convenience and more ways to use digital payments in their daily lives.

title: Ark Invest dumps more Circle shares to renew bets on other stocks
body: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest is showing no signs of slowing down its Circle shares sell-off and has made yet another sizable dump as part of its ongoing portfolio reshuffle. On Monday, June 23, 2025, Ark Invest offloaded another major portion of its million-dollar stake in CRCL, the newly listed stock of stablecoin issuer Circle . The sale, worth approximately $110 million, marked the firm’s fourth large-scale dump in less than a week and comes just a day after its $146.2 million sell-off . ARK spread the three-part sale across different funds. The ARK Innovation ETF (ARKK) sold 306,921 units of the shares, the ARK Next Generation Internet ETF (ARKW) offloaded 72,302, and the remaining 36,621 were sold by the ARK Fintech Innovation ETF (ARKF). Here's every move Cathie Wood and Ark Invest made in the stock market today 6/23 pic.twitter.com/2Z5Bqr0Qva — Ark Invest Daily (@ArkkDaily) June 24, 2025 The streak of sales comes as CRCL continues to surge, suggesting Ark is capitalizing on its early investment gains. Trading at $263.45 at the time of writing, the stock has been on an upward rise since debuting at $31 just weeks ago, and briefly spiked near $300 during intraday trading on Monday. You might also like: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest dumps second batch of Circle shares In total, the Cathie Wood-led investment firm has now sold around 1.6 million CRCL shares. Despite the sell-offs, it maintains its status as one of the largest stakeholders in the stablecoin issuer’s stock and still holds approximately 2.8 million shares. Following the latest sale, Ark Invest reallocated capital into other positions, boosting its holdings in Coinbase (COIN) and Robinhood (HOOD). The firm purchased 4,198 COIN shares worth $1.3 million and 319,640 HOOD shares valued at $24.4 million, among others.
